file.name: AttributesValues_GET_POST.yaml
file.content:
info:
  title: BrAPI
  version: ''
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /attributevalues:
    get:
      summary: Get the Germplasm Attribute Values
      description: Get the Germplasm Attribute Values
      parameters:
      - name: attributeValueDbId
        description: The unique id for an attribute value
        in: query
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: attributeDbId
        description: The unique id for an attribute
        in: query
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: attributeName
        description: The human readable name for an attribute
        in: query
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: germplasmDbId
        description: Get all attributes associated with this germplasm
        in: query
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/externalReferenceID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/externalReferenceSource'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/pageSize'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader'
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/GermplasmAttributeValueListResponse'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
      tags:
      - Germplasm Attribute Values
    post:
      summary: Create new Germplasm Attribute Values
      description: Create new Germplasm Attribute Values
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              items: 
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GermplasmAttributeValueNewRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/GermplasmAttributeValueListResponse'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
      tags:
      - Germplasm Attribute Values
components:
  responses:
    GermplasmAttributeValueListResponse:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            title: GermplasmAttributeValueListResponse
            type: object
            properties:
              '@context':
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Context'
              metadata:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/metadata'
              result:
                properties:
                  data:
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/GermplasmAttributeValue'
                    type: array
                required:
                - data
                type: object
            required:
            - metadata
            - result
      description: OK
      headers: {}

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /attributevalues: get: operation "": parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "#/components/parameters/externalReferenceID" reference: component by reference "#/components/parameters/externalReferenceID" not found
